requirements.summary: Build a frontend gallery view displaying all kayak designs as cards
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays all kayak designs in a responsive grid layout
Each card shows kayak image, name, manufacturer, and year
External links open in new tabs when clicked
Cards are ordered with newest designs first

file_operations.description: Create a reusable card component that displays a single kayak design with image, name, manufacturer, year, and external link. The card should use shadcn/ui Card component and be styled with water-themed colors. External links must open in new tabs.

Create a gallery component that fetches all kayak designs using the backend's getAllKayakDesigns method and renders them in a responsive grid using KayakCard components. Designs should be displayed newest first as returned from backend.
Create a gallery page that wraps the KayakGallery component with appropriate layout and spacing. Include loading and error states.
Add route for the Gallery page and wire it into the application router. Set this as the main landing route for browsing kayak designs.

requirements.summary: Create an admin form to add new kayak designs
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes all required input fields
Successfully submitted designs appear in the gallery immediately

file_operations.description: Create a form component with input fields for kayak name, manufacturer, design year, image URL, and external link URL. Use shadcn/ui Form, Input, and Button components. Implement client-side validation for required fields and URL formats. Call backend's addKayakDesign method on submission. Clear form and show success message after successful submission.
Create an admin page that contains the AddKayakForm component with appropriate layout and instructions for adding new kayak designs.
Add route for the Admin page and wire it into the application router as an admin-accessible route.

requirements.summary: Design a cohesive visual theme inspired by whitewater kayaking
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses water-inspired tones throughout the interface
Typography and spacing create a sense of energy and flow
Layout and interaction patterns feel cohesive with the kayaking theme

file_operations.description: Extend Tailwind theme to include water-themed color palette with teals, aqua, deep blues, and whites as primary/accent colors. Configure typography scale for energetic feel.
Apply global typography styles, base colors from water-themed palette, and spacing utilities that create a sense of flow and movement. Style body and root elements with kayaking-inspired aesthetics.
Create a layout component with header, navigation, and main content area. Use flowing spacing and water-themed colors. Include navigation links to Gallery and Admin pages.
Wrap routed pages with the Layout component to provide consistent theme and navigation throughout the application.

requirements.summary: Render generated kayak-themed hero background and logo from static assets
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays generated background image
Logo appears in header using generated icon asset
Images load correctly from public assets directory

file_operations.description: Create a hero section component that displays the generated hero background image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-rapids.dim_1920x600.png as a background with overlay text introducing the Kayak Design Hub. Use water-themed colors for text and ensure responsive sizing.
Add the generated kayak logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/kayak-logo.dim_200x200.png to the header section. Render it as an img element with appropriate sizing and alt text.
Include the Hero component at the top of the Gallery page to provide visual branding and context for visitors.
